item.description:
Start off your weekend in style at NetSAP Boston's July Cocktails & Conversations (C&C).

This event is a charity fundraiser for Baal Dan, helping children in need. Baal Dan provides grants to help children in need in India, specifically:

- Children under the age of 14
- Street/slum children
- Orphans
- Children from red light areas
- Children with special needs
- Impoverished children

These grants can be in the form of direct donations, goods/supplies in kind, or school fees.

Baal Dan will have a table at the event to answer all your questions regarding the organization and to collect your donations.

If you cannot attend the event, please consider donating to our campaign to help needy street children in India.

CLICK HERE TO DONATE http://www.firstgiving.com/fundraiser/netsapboston/netsapbostoncicbaaldan

DONATIONS ARE TAX DEDUCTIBLE!

There will be a raffle at the end of the event for a chance to win 'Baal Dan' gift items.

Members: FREE
Non-members: $10

'Like' us on facebook at www.facebook.com/netsapboston

Signup for membership at: http://na.netip.org/members/join
Location: Julep Bar, 200 High Street, Boston, MA

Contact: Aniket Songade: Aniket@netsapboston.org This e-mail address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it
item.name: NetSAP Cocktail Party!
